Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters used when a character turns.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

baseTurnSpeedDPS.Wiki: Standard turning speed for normal turning, the speed and time turning rate are applied to this value. In degrees per second.

speedTurnRate_MinSpeedKMPH.AltName: Base - Turn Speed Rate: Minimum Speed
speedTurnRate_MinSpeedKMPH.Wiki: The minimum turning speed that will be used. In kilometres per hour.

speedTurnRate_MaxSpeedKMPH.AltName: Base - Turn Speed Rate: Maximum Speed
speedTurnRate_MaxSpeedKMPH.Wiki: The maximum turning speed that will be used. In kilometres per hour.

speedTurnRate_MinSpeedTurnRate.AltName: Base - Turn Speed Rate: % at Minimum Speed

speedTurnRate_MaxSpeedTurnRate.AltName: Base - Turn Speed Rate: % at Maximum Speed

timeTurnRate_MinTimeSec.AltName: Base - Turn Time Rate: Minimum Time
timeTurnRate_MinTimeSec.Wiki: The minimum time turning rate will be reached within this time after the parameter is switched. In seconds.

timeTurnRate_MaxTimeSec.AltName: Base - Turn Time Rate: Maximum Time
timeTurnRate_MaxTimeSec.Wiki: The maximum time turning rate will be reached within this time after the parameter is switched. In seconds.

timeTurnRate_MinTimeTurnRate.AltName: Base - Turn Time Rate: % at Minimum Time
timeTurnRate_MinTimeTurnRate.Wiki: Time turning rate at minimum time.

timeTurnRate_MaxTimeTurnRate.AltName: Base - Turn Time Rate: % at Maximum Time
timeTurnRate_MaxTimeTurnRate.Wiki: Time turning rate at maximum time.

lookTargetModeTurnSpeedDPS.Wiki: Turning speed in the mode facing the target direction, reference turning speed is not used. In degrees per second.

lookTargetModeTurnSpeedDPSAtLowDeltaAngl.AltName: Look Target - Turn Speed with Low Delta
lookTargetModeTurnSpeedDPSAtLowDeltaAngl.Wiki: Turning speed in the mode facing the target when the angle difference is small, the reference turning speed is not used. In degrees per second.

judgeTurnSpeedThresholdAngleDeg.AltName: Look Target - Low Delta Judgment Angle
judgeTurnSpeedThresholdAngleDeg.Wiki: If the angle is smaller than this, the low delta angle speed will be used. In degrees.

lookTargetMode_SpeedTurnRate_MinSpeedKMP.AltName: Look Target - Turn Speed Rate: Minimum Speed
lookTargetMode_SpeedTurnRate_MinSpeedKMP.Wiki: The minimum turning speed that will be used. In kilometres per hour.

lookTargetMode_SpeedTurnRate_MaxSpeedKMP.AltName: Look Target - Turn Speed Rate: Maximum Speed
lookTargetMode_SpeedTurnRate_MaxSpeedKMP.Wiki: The maximum turning speed that will be used. In kilometres per hour.

lookTargetMode_SpeedTurnRate_MinSpeedTur.AltName: Look Target - Turn Speed Rate: % at Minimum Speed

lookTargetMode_SpeedTurnRate_MaxSpeedTur.AltName: Look Target - Turn Speed Rate: % at Maximum Speed

lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MinTimeSec.AltName: Look Target - Turn Time Rate: Minimum Time
lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MinTimeSec.Wiki: The minimum time turning rate will be reached within this time after the parameter is switched. In seconds.

lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MaxTimeSec.AltName: Look Target - Turn Time Rate: Maximum Time
lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MaxTimeSec.Wiki: The maximum time turning rate will be reached within this time after the parameter is switched. In seconds.

lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MinTimeTurnR.AltName: Look Target - Turn Time Rate: % at Minimum Time
lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MinTimeTurnR.Wiki: Time turning rate at minimum time.

lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MaxTimeTurnR.AltName: Look Target - Turn Time Rate: % at Maximum Time
lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MaxTimeTurnR.Wiki: Time turning rate at maximum time.

turnAccelDPSS.Wiki: Acceleration to reach turning speed. If you want to set the turning speed from the beginning, set a large value. In degrees per second ^ 2

lookTargetMode_LookAheadSecond.Wiki: How many seconds after the target do you try to look when facing the target (for AI).

timeTurnRate_MinTimeSec_Accel.AltName: Base - Time Turn Acceleration Rate: Minimum Time
timeTurnRate_MinTimeSec_Accel.Wiki: The minimum time angular acceleration rate is reached within this time after the parameter is switched. In seconds.

timeTurnRate_MaxTimeSec_Accel.AltName: Base - Time Turn Acceleration Rate: Maximum Time
timeTurnRate_MaxTimeSec_Accel.Wiki: The maximum time angular acceleration rate is reached within this time after the parameter is switched. In seconds.

timeTurnRate_MinTimeTurnAccelRate.AltName: Base - Time Turn Acceleration Rate: Minimum Acceleration Rate
timeTurnRate_MinTimeTurnAccelRate.Wiki: Time angular acceleration rate at minimum time

timeTurnRate_MaxTimeTurnAccelRate.AltName: Base - Time Turn Acceleration Rate: Maximum Acceleration Rate
timeTurnRate_MaxTimeTurnAccelRate.Wiki: Time angular acceleration rate at maximum time

lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MinTimeSec_A.AltName: Look Target - Time Turn Acceleration Rate: Minimum Time
lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MinTimeSec_A.Wiki: The minimum time angular acceleration rate is reached within this time after the parameter is switched. In seconds.

lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MaxTimeSec_A.AltName: Look Target - Time Turn Acceleration Rate: Maximum Time
lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MaxTimeSec_A.Wiki: The maximum time angular acceleration rate is reached within this time after the parameter is switched. In seconds.

lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MinTimeTurnA.AltName: Look Target - Time Turn Acceleration Rate: Minimum Acceleration Rate
lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MinTimeTurnA.Wiki: Time angular acceleration rate at minimum time

lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MaxTimeTurnA.AltName: Look Target - Time Turn Acceleration Rate: Maximum Acceleration Rate
lookTargetMode_TimeTurnRate_MaxTimeTurnA.Wiki: Time angular acceleration rate at maximum time

paramEndIntpTimeSec.AltName: Angular Acceleration Interpolation Time at Parameter End
paramEndIntpTimeSec.Wiki: Time to interpolate acceleration when parameters switch and exit. In seconds.

reverseTurnBrakeDPSS.Wiki: Brake when turning in the opposite direction (disabled at -1). In degrees per second ^ 2

animBlendMaxSpeedDPS_LR.AltName: Angular Velocity for Left/Right Blend Ratio
animBlendMaxSpeedDPS_LR.Wiki: When the angular velocity exceeds this speed, the blend ratio of left and right animation becomes 1. In degrees per second.
